name: Improved Charging Hurler
descriptionText: Every muscle in your body adds its force to your thrown weapons.
benefitText: When you use Charging Hurler, your target can be at any range up to your weapon's maximum range. If your target is within 30 feet, you gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls.
normalText: Using Charging Hurler requires you to end your movement within 30 feet of your opponent.
